selected_quotes: The Turnbull government needs to learn a thing or two about innovation from hacker culture.
The importance of teaching people to prototype innovations, and fail and learn fast
In 2000 innovation was planned driven frm above. Now it means entrepreneurship, self-organising teams fast ideas
#Innovation today is 'not just about taking risks but minimising managing them' #ausbiz @timray…

citation.abstract: Innovation is not just about taking risks, but minimising and managing them.
citation.title: Innovation culture has evolved beyond Turnbull's mantra

facebook.title: Innovation culture has evolved beyond Turnbull's mantra
facebook.summary: The top down version of business or government only works if customers and voters have been listened to and are in agreement. Australia and most of the developed world's voters have been moving away from the top down (trickle down from the elite) approach

facebook.title: Innovation culture has evolved beyond Turnbull's mantra
facebook.summary: Design process that researches users needs, prototypes quickly and fails often is the key to innovation.
